1.name: Street Angel
1.description: A woman on the run from the law finds her past catching up to her just as she is on the verge of true happiness.

2.name: La passion de Jeanne d'Arc
2.description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

3.name: The Man Who Laughs
3.description: When a proud noble refuses to kiss the hand of the despotic King James in 1690, he is cruelly executed and his son surgically disfigured.

4.name: Show People
4.description: A young lady from Georgia goes to Hollywood in the hopes of becoming an actress.

5.name: The Circus
5.description: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

6.name: The Godless Girl
6.description: Two teenagers, one an atheist and the other a Christian, fall in love at a brutal reform school.

7.name: The Cameraman
7.description: Hopelessly in love with a woman working at MGM Studios, a clumsy man attempts to become a motion picture cameraman to be close to the object of his desire.

8.name: Steamboat Bill, Jr.
8.description: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

9.name: The Crowd
9.description: The life of a man and woman together in a large, impersonal metropolis through their hopes, struggles and downfalls.

10.name: The Wind
10.description: A frail young woman from the east moves in with her cousin in the west, where she causes tension within the family and is slowly driven mad.

11.name: Spione
11.description: The mastermind behind a ubiquitous spy operation learns of a dangerous romance between a Russian lady in his employ and a dashing agent from the government's secret service.

12.name: Lonesome
12.description: Two lonely people in the big city meet and enjoy the thrills of an amusement park, only to lose each other in the crowd after spending a great day together. Will they ever see each other again?

13.name: Sadie Thompson
13.description: A prostitute seeking a fresh start becomes the obsession of a religious extremist.

14.name: Noah's Ark
14.description: The Biblical story of Noah and the Great Flood, with a parallel story of soldiers in the First World War.

15.name: Speedy
15.description: Harold "Speedy" Swift, a fan of Babe Ruth and the New York Yankees, saves from extinction the city's last horse-drawn trolley, operated by his girlfriend's grandfather.

16.name: The Wedding March
16.description: A young impoverished aristocrat falls in love with an inn-keepers daughter, but has to marry money.

17.name: La chute de la maison Usher
17.description: Allan visits the sinister Usher family mansion, where his friend Roderick is painting a portrait of his sickly wife Madeline. The portrait seems to be draining the life out of Madeline, slowly leading to her death.

18.name: The Patriot
18.description: In 18th-Century Russia, the Czar, Paul, is surrounded by murderous plots and trusts only Count Pahlen. Pahlen wishes to protect his friend, the mad king, but because of the horror of the ...                See full summary »

19.name: The Farmer's Wife
19.description: After his daughter weds, a middle-aged widower with a profitable farm decides to remarry, but finds choosing a suitable mate a problematic process.

20.name: The River
20.description: A naïve young man is working on a logging camp beside a turbulent river. When it closes for winter, he opts to stay for the experience. He meets a woman who was the girlfriend to the boss ...                See full summary »

21.name: The Docks of New York
21.description: A blue-collar worker on New York's depressed waterfront finds his life changed after he saves a woman attempting suicide.

22.name: Easy Virtue
22.description: A recently divorced woman hides her scandalous past from her new husband and his family.

23.name: Champagne
23.description: A spoiled heiress defies her father by running off to marry her lover. However, Daddy has a few tricks up his sleeve.

24.name: A Woman of Affairs
24.description: When two childhood sweethearts are kept from marrying, misery ensues.

25.name: Our Dancing Daughters
25.description: A flapper who's secretly a good girl and a gold digging floozy masquerading as an ingénue both vie for the hand of a millionaire.

26.name: Shiraz
26.description: A historical romance set in the Mughal Empire. Selima (Enakshi) is a princess-foundling raised by a potter and loved by her brother, Shiraz (Rai). She is abducted and sold as a slave to ...                See full summary »

27.name: White Shadows in the South Seas
27.description: An alcoholic doctor on a Polynesian island, disgusted by white exploitation of the natives, finds himself marooned on a pristinely beautiful island.

28.name: Beggars of Life
28.description: After killing her treacherous step-father, a girl tries to escape the country with a young vagabond. She dresses as a boy, they hop freight trains, quarrel with a group of hobos, and steal ...                See full summary »

29.name: The Last Command
29.description: A former Imperial Russian general and cousin of the Czar ends up in Hollywood as an extra in a movie directed by a former revolutionary.

30.name: Laugh, Clown, Laugh
30.description: A professional clown and a self-indulgent count learn to help each other with their problems, but then become romantic rivals.

31.name: The Racket
31.description: An honest police captain vows to bring down a powerful bootlegger who is protected by corrupt politicians and judges.

32.name: Potomok Chingis-Khana
32.description: In 1918 a simple Mongolian herdsman escapes to the hills after brawling with a western capitalist fur trader who cheats him. In 1920 he helps the partisans fight for the Soviets against the...                See full summary »

33.name: 4 Devils
33.description: Four orphans, raised by an aging clown, becomes a high wire act in a circus.

34.name: West of Zanzibar
34.description: A magician seeks vengeance upon the man who paralyzed him and the illegitimate daughter he sired with the magician's wife.

35.name: Alraune
35.description: A scientist interested in the laws of heredity, impregnates a prostitute in a laboratory with the semen of a hanged murderer. The prostitute conceives a female child who has no concept of love, whom the professor adopts.

36.name: Moulin Rouge
36.description: Parysia is the rage of Paris. She has a daughter, secretly engaged to Andre, and the boy's aristocratic father objects to the alliance because of Margaret's mother being a revue artist. ...                See full summary »

37.name: In Old Arizona
37.description: A charming, happy-go-lucky bandit in old Arizona plays cat-and-mouse with the sheriff trying to catch him while he romances a local beauty.

38.name: The Patsy
38.description: An awkward teenager hopelessly in love with her elder sister's boyfriend tries to make him notice her.

39.name: Lilac Time
39.description: All of those handsome young men in their flying machines are billeted in a field next to the Widow Berthelot's farmhouse in France. Her daughter Jeannine is curious about the young men ...                See full summary »

40.name: Four Sons
40.description: A family saga in which three of a Bavarian widow's sons go to war for Germany and the fourth goes to America, Germany's eventual opponent.

41.name: Hangman's House
41.description: "Citizen" Hogan, an exile Irish patriot, risks his life by returning to Ireland and helping a young couple.

42.name: The Mysterious Lady
42.description: An attractive Russian spy seduces an Austrian officer in order to get some important plans, but when she actually falls in love with him, both of them are placed in a dangerous situation.

43.name: The Divine Woman
43.description: [For 9 minute surviving fragment] Lucian, a soldier in Paris, is to ship out for Algiers at 9 that evening. He stops by for a last meal with his love, Marianne. He may be worried that when ...                See full summary »

44.name: Lights of New York
44.description: Two men are conned into bootlegging business.

45.name: Tempest
45.description: In Czarist Russia, a peasant officer, resented by the aristocrats, falls in love with a princess.

46.name: Zvenigora
46.description: Zvenigora stars Nikolai Nademsky (Earth), as the grandfather of Timoshka (Semyon Svashenko), whom he alerts to secret treasure buried in the mountains and the boy spends the rest of his ...                See full synopsis »

47.name: Ramona
47.description: In early California, Señora Morena (Vera Lewis) runs a large sheep ranch. Her son and heir Felipe (Roland Drew) has fallen in love with her adopted daughter Ramona (Dolores Del Rio), though...                See full synopsis »

48.name: L'argent
48.description: The business tycoon Nicolas Saccard is nearly ruined by his rival Gunderman, when he tries to raise capital for his company. To push up the price of his stock, Saccard plans a publicity ...                See full summary »

49.name: The Shopworn Angel
49.description: Shortly after the United States enters World War I in 1917, a Broadway actress agrees to let a naive soldier court her in order to impress his friends, but a real romance soon begins.

50.name: Shooting Stars
50.description: The husband and wife acting team of Mae Feather and Julian Gordon is torn apart when he discovers she is having an affair with the screen comedian Andy Wilks. Mae hatches a plot to kill her...                See full summary »
